K10D0152_H0153:17b-18: nga rgyal dang bral ba yin; chos kyi sbyin pa la ser sna med pa yin /

K10D0152_H0153:17b-20: theg pa dman pa la 'dod pa med pa'i phyir byang chub kyi bsam pa yin /
K10D0152_H0153:17b-21: dbang po spas pa'i phyir nang nye bar zhi ba yin /
K10D0152_H0153:17b-22: skyon shin tu mthong ba'i phyir phyi rol nye bar zhi ba yin /
K10D0152_H0153:17b-23: sdig pa thams cad mi byed pa'i phyir 'khor bas skrag pa yin /
K10D0152_H0153:18a-1: pa gsog pas mi ngoms pa'i phyir yid yongs su mi skyo ba yin /
K10D0152_H0153:18a-2: chu bo bzhi las bsgral ba'i phyir chos kyi gru chen po yang dag par spyor ba yin /
K10D0152_H0153:18a-3: pha rol tu 'gro ba'i phyir stegs dang zam pa shin tu bcas pa yin /
K10D0152_H0153:18a-4: thang la shin tu gnas pa'i phyir 'dam dang 'obs las brgal ba yin te /
K10D0152_H0153:18a-6: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
K10D0152_H0153:18a-7: gang gi tshe chos 'di lta bu de dag gis
K10D0152_H0153:18a-8: dag pa dang / yongs su dag pa dang /
K10D0152_H0153:18a-10: tshul khrims yongs su dag pa de ni /
K10D0152_H0153:18a-11: thams cad mkhyen par sems bskyed pa rin po che de sbyong ba'o //
K10D0152_H0153:18a-12: de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so //
K10D0152_H0153:18a-13: lus dang ngag rnams dang ni yid bsdams shing //
K10D0152_H0153:18a-14: rnam par dag pa'i las lam bcu la slob //
K10D0152_H0153:18a-15: byams pas sems can kun la yang dag lta //
K10D0152_H0153:18a-16: 'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems sbyong yin //
K10D0152_H0153:18a-17: snying rje ldan pas gzhan gyi bya bar brtson; ;dga' dang ldan pas chos la pha rol sbyor //
K10D0152_H0153:18a-18: btang snyoms ldan pas chos mchog 'tshe ba med //
K10D0152_H0153:18a-19: 'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems sbyong yin //
K10D0152_H0153:18a-20: rtag tu drang zhing g-yo ni rnam par spangs //
K10D0152_H0153:18a-21: gzhan la phan byed sdig pa rnam par spangs //
K10D0152_H0153:18a-22: lhag bsam dge ba ci yod rjes su 'jug /
K10D0152_H0153:18a-23: 'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems sbyong yin //
K10D0152_H0153:18b-0: shes @18b rab rab 'jug dran dang shes bzhin can //
K10D0152_H0153:18b-1: sems rab dul bas sems ni las su rang //
K10D0152_H0153:18b-2: sbyangs pa'i yon tan rnams dang gso gla ba //
K10D0152_H0153:18b-3: 'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems sbyong yin //
K10D0152_H0153:18b-4: 'phags rigs chog shes pa dang tshig mnyen dang //
K10D0152_H0153:18b-5: bla ma rnams la rtag tu 'dud byed dang //
K10D0152_H0153:18b-6: rtsod brdzun nga rgyal spangs dang stobs ldan dang //
K10D0152_H0153:18b-7: brnyas dang log pa nam yang byed ma yin /
K10D0152_H0153:18b-8: sems ni nges sems mngon pa'i nga rgyal bral //
K10D0152_H0153:18b-9: rnyog pa med cing rab tu dad la gsal //
K10D0152_H0153:18b-10: bdag shes pa la rim gyis 'jug par byed //
K10D0152_H0153:18b-11: gzhan la mi brnyas sems can rjes su srung //
K10D0152_H0153:18b-12: chos la gus par dga' zhing gus dang bcas //
K10D0152_H0153:18b-13: bsgrims te nyon mongs rnams ni spong bar byed //
K10D0152_H0153:18b-14: chos don gnyer zhing chos la rton par byed //
K10D0152_H0153:18b-15: rtag tu chos don gzhol zhing 'bab par byed //
K10D0152_H0153:18b-16: chos la brtson zhing nyon mongs med pa bsgoms //
K10D0152_H0153:18b-17: chos min spangs shin chos rnams yongs su tshol //
K10D0152_H0153:18b-18: dkon mchog gsum la dad pa mi phyed ldan //
K10D0152_H0153:18b-19: 'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems sbyong yin //
K10D0152_H0153:18b-20: rtag tu 'dzem dang ldan zhing nyes spyod ldog /
K10D0152_H0153:18b-21: de bzhin gshegs pa kun la ngo tshas sdom //
K10D0152_H0153:18b-22: khrel yod ldan zhing 'dir ni dbang po bsdams //
K10D0152_H0153:18b-23: 'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems sbyong yin //
K10D0152_H0153:18b-24: rab tu sbyor bas las kyi bya bar 'jug /
K10D0152_H0153:18b-25: bag yod pas na mtha' gnyis 'dzin mi byed //
K10D0152_H0153:18b-26: mkhas pa sten pa'i chos rnams rjes rtogs pa //
K10D0152_H0153:19a-1: cad mkhyen pa'i sems sbyong yin //
K10D0152_H0153:19a-2: spyod lam gyis ni rang ba'i dngos dang ldan //
K10D0152_H0153:19a-3: khengs pa med pas rtag tu mnyen pa nyid //
K10D0152_H0153:19a-4: zhi gnas cho ga ldan pas rgod pa med; ;'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems sbyong yin //
K10D0152_H0153:19a-5: blo ni rab tu brtan pas nyams pa med //
K10D0152_H0153:19a-6: lhag mthong la ni ri rgyal ji bzhin te //
K10D0152_H0153:19a-7: dam bcas brtan zhing bar skabs nyams pa med //
K10D0152_H0153:19a-8: 'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems sbyong yin //
K10D0152_H0153:19a-9: sdug bsngal bde bas mi g-yo sa dang mtshungs //
K10D0152_H0153:19a-10: bsam pa dag bas chu ltar dri ma 'khru //
K10D0152_H0153:19a-11: rtag tu rlom sems med bas me dang mtshungs //
K10D0152_H0153:19a-12: gnas med rgyu bas rtag tu rlung dang 'dra //
K10D0152_H0153:19a-13: shin tu dri ma med pas mkha' mnyam sems //
K10D0152_H0153:19a-14: rab tu byung bas sangs rgyas bstan pa rnyed //
K10D0152_H0153:19a-15: lus ni dpen zhing zhi bas dgon par dga'//
K10D0152_H0153:19a-16: sems dben pas ni chos kyi mchog la spyod //
K10D0152_H0153:19a-17: dge bar bden par smra dang yang dag smra //
K10D0152_H0153:19a-18: ji skad smras pa de ni de bzhin byed //
K10D0152_H0153:19a-19: nyon mongs mi rdzi dge la dpa' bo mchog /
K10D0152_H0153:19a-20: shin tu bslabs pas bslab pa yang dag 'dzin //
K10D0152_H0153:19a-21: de la lhod pa nam yang yod ma yin //
K10D0152_H0153:19a-22: kha na ma tho chung la'ang rtag tu 'jigs //
K10D0152_H0153:19a-23: byang chub mchog rgyu'i tshul khrims nyams pa med //
K10D0152_H0153:19a-24: yon tan dkar spyod tshul khrims 'dres pa med //
K10D0152_H0153:19a-25: dge ba'i bshes gnyen sten cing sdig pa min //
K10D0152_H0153:19b-0: rdzogs pa'i byang @19b chub sems dpa' bya phyir brtan //
K10D0152_H0153:19b-1: de ltar de yi mig ni dri med kyis //
K10D0152_H0153:19b-2: 'jig rten kun la 'od zer mnyam par lta //
K10D0152_H0153:19b-3: mkhas pa de ni sna tshogs sgra thos nas //
K10D0152_H0153:19b-4: dga' med rangs pa med cing zhum pa med //
K10D0152_H0153:19b-5: blo ldan de ni sgra yi don rtogs shes //
K10D0152_H0153:19b-6: de yi rna ba de ltar rnam dag nyid //
K10D0152_H0153:19b-7: sna yis dri dang lce yis ro rnams dang //
K10D0152_H0153:19b-8: lus kyis rig dang yid kyis chos rnams la //
K10D0152_H0153:19b-9: reg gnas ma khengs ma dud zhum pa med //
K10D0152_H0153:19b-10: de ltar de yi dbang po dag pa nyid //
K10D0152_H0153:19b-11: chags pas mi chags sdang bas sdang ba med //
K10D0152_H0153:19b-12: gti mug ma rmongs mi sdug gnas pa can //
K10D0152_H0153:19b-13: byams la dga' zhing rkyen gyis chos sems pa //
K10D0152_H0153:19b-14: 'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems sbyong yin //
K10D0152_H0153:19b-15: sgrib pa lnga po dag gis bsgribs pa med //
K10D0152_H0153:19b-16: de ltar des ni dbang po lnga yang bsgoms //
K10D0152_H0153:19b-17: de ni gang du'ang sgrib med bcings pa'ang med //
K10D0152_H0153:19b-18: stobs rnams lnga dpag la rab tu gnas /
K10D0152_H0153:19b-19: kun nas ldang ba shes shing byung ba nyid //
K10D0152_H0153:19b-20: tshul bzhin ma yin spangs shing tshul bzhin gnas; ;dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la sten //
K10D0152_H0153:19b-21: yang dag spong dang rdzu 'phrul rkang par ldan //
K10D0152_H0153:19b-22: byang chub yan lag sten dang rtag tu ldan //
K10D0152_H0153:19b-23: brtan pa de ni yan lag brgyad la mchog de ni 'dod dang sdang dang 'jigs mi 'gro /
K10D0152_H0153:19b-24: gti mug bral zhing dbang po shin tu bsdams //
K10D0152_H0153:19b-25: chos kyi sbyin la de ni ser sna med //
K10D0152_H0153:19b-26: slob dpon nam yang chos 'chab mi byed do //
K10D0152_H0153:20a-1: med par chos ni ston par byed //
K10D0152_H0153:20a-2: des na de ni byang chub sems dag 'gyur //
K10D0152_H0153:20a-3: de ni zang zing rnams la kun 'dzin med //
K10D0152_H0153:20a-4: rnam smin re med 'dod rgu gtong bar byed sbyin dang snyan dang don byed don mthun pas //
K10D0152_H0153:20a-5: de ni sems can brgya dag rab tu sdud //
K10D0152_H0153:20a-6: de yi byang chub sems ni brjed mi 'gyur //
K10D0152_H0153:20a-7: theg pa dman la nam yang re ba med //
K10D0152_H0153:20a-8: ji lta ji ltar sangs rgyas yon tan mthong //
K10D0152_H0153:20a-9: de lta de ltar de bas ri rab 'dra //
K10D0152_H0153:20a-10: nad ni rab zhi srid pa'i nyes pa mthong //
K10D0152_H0153:20a-11: de ni gzhan gyi 'khrul la lta mi byed //
K10D0152_H0153:20a-12: 'dus byas nyes pa dag kyang shin tu mthong //
K10D0152_H0153:20a-13: 'khor bas 'jigs pas sdig pa rnams mi byed //
K10D0152_H0153:20a-14: legs spyod khur khyer bas ni skyo ba med //
K10D0152_H0153:20a-15: zhing rnams sbyong bar 'dod pa nyams pa med //
K10D0152_H0153:20a-16: chos rnams yongs su bzung bas zhum pa med //
K10D0152_H0153:20a-17: sems can thar byed rgyu la 'jigs pa med //
K10D0152_H0153:20a-18: chu bo bzhi po dag las bsgral ba'i phyir //
K10D0152_H0153:20a-19: de ni chos gru yang dag sbyor bar byed //
K10D0152_H0153:20a-20: lus can mya ngan 'das lam gzud pa'i phyir //
K10D0152_H0153:20a-21: de ni stegs dang zam pa 'cha' bar byed //
K10D0152_H0153:20a-22: 'dam las 'das shin 'bas las brgal nas ni //
K10D0152_H0153:20a-23: thang la gnas shing de dag 'jigs med gnas; ;'jigs pas g-yen spyos rnams la 'jigs med ston //
K10D0152_H0153:20a-24: bdag nyid rgal nas de dag gzhan yang sgrol //
K10D0152_H0153:20a-25: gang dag chos tshul 'di dag rnam dag cing //
K10D0152_H0153:20b-0: rdzogs @20b pa'i byang chub sems brtan kha lo sgyur //
K10D0152_H0153:20b-1: de dag byang chub sems mchog rnam dag ste //
K10D0152_H0153:20b-2: nyon mongs dri mas gzhar yang gos mi 'gyur //
K10D0152_H0153:20b-3: de ste nam mtha' nyon mongs bya bar nus //
K10D0152_H0153:20b-4: de la rjes kyang bstan par nus srid kyi //
K10D0152_H0153:20b-5: rang bzhin 'od gsal rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems //
K10D0152_H0153:20b-6: de ni nam yang nyon mongs byar mi nus //
K10D0152_H0153:20b-7: thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems rin po che yongs su sbyang ba'i le'u ste /
K10D0152_H0153:20b-9: 'phags pa blo gros rgya mtshos zhus pa /
K10D0152_H0153:20b-12: thams cad mkhyen par sems bskyed pa rin po che de'i gnod pa bzod pa ni /
K10D0152_H0153:20b-14: thams cad mkhyen par sems bskyed pa rin po che di'e gnod pa ni /
K10D0152_H0153:20b-17: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
K10D0152_H0153:20b-18: thams cad mkhyen par sems bskyed pa rin po che
K10D0152_H0153:20b-19: de ltar bskyed nas 'phags pa ma yin pa tshul
K10D0152_H0153:20b-20: khrims 'chal ba'i sems can rnams sam /
K10D0152_H0153:20b-22: bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams sam /
K10D0152_H0153:20b-23: bdud kyi byin gyis brlabs pa rnams sam /
K10D0152_H0153:20b-24: bdud kyi kho nya rnams kyis gtses sam /
K10D0152_H0153:20b-28: dkrugs sam; kun tu dkrugs sam /
K10D0152_H0153:20b-30: brdegs kyang byang chub tu bsam pa'i sems bskyed pa de las mi phyed pa dang /
K10D0152_H0153:21a-0: sems can thams cad rab tu thar par bya ba'i snying @21a *//
K10D0152_H0153:21a-1: rje chen pos brtson 'grus brtsams pa las mi phyed pa dang /
K10D0152_H0153:21a-2: dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs mi 'chad par bya bar brtson pa las mi phyed pa dang /
K10D0152_H0153:21a-3: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par sgrub
K10D0152_H0153:21a-4: pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba la sbyor ba las mi
K10D0152_H0153:21a-5: phyed pa dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po
K10D0152_H0153:21a-6: yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ba'i bsod nams kyi tshogs
K10D0152_H0153:21a-7: bsags pa las mi phyed pa dang /
K10D0152_H0153:21a-8: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang ba mngon par bsgrubs pa'i brtson pa las mi phyed pa dang /
K10D0152_H0153:21a-9: lus dang srog 'dor zhing dam pa'i chos yongs su
K10D0152_H0153:21a-10: 'dzin par mngon par brtson pa las mi phyed pa
K10D0152_H0153:21a-11: dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smin par
K10D0152_H0153:21a-12: bya ba la mngon par brtson shing bdag bde ba
K10D0152_H0153:21a-13: la mi chags pa las mi phyed pa ste /
K10D0152_H0153:21a-14: de de ltar lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs
K10D0152_H0153:21a-15: par gyur pas sems can thams cad kyis dpyas kyang
K10D0152_H0153:21a-16: bzod / thing slad byas pa dang /
K10D0152_H0153:21a-19: sems can thams cad kyis spyos sam /
K10D0152_H0153:21a-22: ngan du smras pa'i tshig gi lam yang bzod /
K10D0152_H0153:21a-23: sems can thams cad kyi gnod pa'ang bzod /
K10D0152_H0153:21a-24: sems can thams cad kyi khur yang bzod /
K10D0152_H0153:21a-25: sgrol bas kyang skyo ba med /
K10D0152_H0153:21b-0: stobs nye bar @21b ston par byed /
K10D0152_H0153:21b-1: mthu skyed par byed cing brtson 'grus rtsom la rtul bas rtul bar byed /
K10D0152_H0153:21b-2: spro ba skyed cing rmongs pa'i sems mi 'dzin to //
K10D0152_H0153:21b-3: de spyos kyang slar mi gshe /
K10D0152_H0153:21b-7: de ltar sems brang ba'i go cha gyon no //
K10D0152_H0153:21b-10: 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa'i theg pa'o //
K10D0152_H0153:21b-13: rgyun gyi rjes su 'gro ba dag go /
K10D0152_H0153:21b-15: rgyun las ldog par rtsol bar 'dod pa'o //
K10D0152_H0153:21b-17: phan tshun mi mthun pa dag go /
K10D0152_H0153:21b-19: sems can thams cad kyi mi mthun pa spang ba'i phyir go cha bgos pa'o //
K10D0152_H0153:21b-21: gnod sems la dpa' ba dag go /
K10D0152_H0153:21b-24: des pa yongs su tshol ba'o //
K10D0152_H0153:21b-26: gcig la gcig yongs su 'drid par gnas pa dag go /
K10D0152_H0153:21b-28: shes rab kyis ngoms pa yongs su tshol ba'o //
K10D0152_H0153:21b-29: gal te sems can de dag phyogs bcu'i rab tu
K10D0152_H0153:21b-30: dbye bas rab tu dbye ba ji snyed pa de
K10D0152_H0153:21b-31: dag thams cad ral gri dang /
K10D0152_H0153:21b-33: mda' bo che lag na thogs te bdag gi phyi bzhin 'brang yang /
K10D0152_H0153:21b-38: byang chub kyi sems skye bar 'gyur ba dang /
K10D0152_H0153:22a-5: thos pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sems skye bar 'gyur
K10D0152_H0153:22a-6: ba'i sa phyogs der de dag lus rgya shug gi
K10D0152_H0153:22a-7: lo ma'i brgya cha tsam du gtubs sam /
K10D0152_H0153:22a-10: sems can de dag thams cad las gzhan mi byed par rgyun du gshe'am /
K10D0152_H0153:22a-14: tshig ngan pa dang ngag rtsu ba po smra ba
K10D0152_H0153:22a-15: de ltar gyur kyang bdag gis sems can 'ga' la'ang
K10D0152_H0153:22a-16: 'khrug pa'i sems bskyed par mi bya'o //
K10D0152_H0153:22a-18: sngon gyi mtha' nas 'khor ba tshad med par byas
K10D0152_H0153:22a-19: te gang du bdag gi lus 'di sems can dmyal
K10D0152_H0153:22a-20: bar song ngam / dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ngam /
K10D0152_H0153:22a-21: gshin rje'i 'jig rten dus song ngam /
K10D0152_H0153:22a-22: mir gyur kyang rung ste 'dod pa'i zas kyi dri
K10D0152_H0153:22a-23: mas dri ma can du gyur nas chos thos pa
K10D0152_H0153:22a-24: dang mi ldan zhing yang ba'i 'tsho ba'i spyod yul
K10D0152_H0153:22a-25: don med pas 'tsho ba can du gyur te yan
K10D0152_H0153:22a-26: lag dang / nying lag brgyar gshegs shing gtubs te
K10D0152_H0153:22a-27: phye zhing phral la bya ba rnam pa mang po
K10D0152_H0153:22a-28: byas kyang bdag gis gzhi de las bdag gi don
K10D0152_H0153:22a-29: lag dang / byas kyi / gzhan gyi don ma
K10D0152_H0153:22a-30: byas pas gal te sems can de dag thams cad
K10D0152_H0153:22a-31: kyis phyi ma'i mthar bdag gi lus gshegs /
K10D0152_H0153:22b-0: rnam par @22b bcom pa de lta bur gyur kyang
K10D0152_H0153:22b-1: bdag gis thams cad mkhyen pa yongs su mi gtong
K10D0152_H0153:22b-2: ngo // sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ngo //
K10D0152_H0153:22b-3: dge ba'i chos la 'dun pa yongs su mi gtong ngo //
K10D0152_H0153:22b-5: lus gtubs pa'i lus kyi gnod pa 'di lta bu thams cad ni /
K10D0152_H0153:22b-6: sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal gyi brgya'i char yang
K10D0152_H0153:22b-7: nye bar mi 'gro ba nas rgyu'i du'ang mi bzod
K10D0152_H0153:22b-9: sems can dmyal bar gnas par spro'o //
K10D0152_H0153:22b-10: bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos gtang bar ni /
K10D0152_H0153:22b-12: sems can thams cad rab tu thar par bya ba
K10D0152_H0153:22b-13: la dmigs pa'i snying rje chen po mi gtong ngo
K10D0152_H0153:22b-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang gsungs te /
K10D0152_H0153:22b-19: mi dge ba'i phyogs la ni; grogs byed pa mang ngo //
K10D0152_H0153:22b-22: zhes gsungs pas bdag gis mi dge ba'i phyogs kyi grogs mi bya'i /

K10D0152_H0153:28a-9: gsungs // gang bzod dpa' bo de ni mi phyed bzod pa yin //

K10D0152_H0153:175b-10: ba de ltar bdud thams cad dang /

K10D0152_H0153:175b-22: blo gros rgya mtshos gsol ba btab pa mkhyen nas

K10D0152_H0153:176a-9: yod pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs
K10D0152_H0153:176a-10: nyid du gnas par kun tu snang ngo //
K10D0152_H0153:176a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs de dag gis gsung gcig tu kye ma'o chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni /

K10D0152_H0153:179a-0: rin chen bkang ste rgyal la phul @179a *//
K10D0152_H0153:179a-1: ba bas; ;ji ltar bstan pa bzhin du gang gnas pa'i //

K10D0152_H0153:179a-9: chos bzhi 'di dag dpag tu med pa ste //

K10D0152_H0153:179a-13: snang ba byung zhing me tog char yang bab //

K10D0152_H0153:179a-26: sh'akya sengge'i bskul ba legs zhes gsung //
K10D0152_H0153:179b-0: lha @179b dang klu dang lha min mi'am ci //
K10D0152_H0153:179b-1: dri za gnod sbyin mkha' lding lto 'phye che //
K10D0152_H0153:179b-2: brgya byin tshangs pa 'jig rten skyong ba rnams //

K10D0152_H0153:179b-7: legs gsungs chos ni gzhan yang nub mi 'gyur //
